alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Oconto; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 11:08PM CST until December 15 at 11:30PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN FOREST...MENOMINEE...NORTH CENTRAL WAUPACA...NORTHERN OCONTO...EASTERN LANGLADE AND WESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 1108 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of North Otter Creek Natural Area to near Crandon to 6 miles west of White Lake to near Wittenberg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crandon, Neopit, Carter, Gardner Dam Scout Camp and McCaslin Mountain Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Oconto; Shawano; Waupaca
